poem:
"Striking Coalitions, Unseen Stories"

ANC and DA, rival minds, unite,
In the rainbow's light, create a pact tight. 
Ramaphosa aims the arrow,
Past leftwing shadows, to a centrist meadow.
No seizing land, no breakaway,
A new governance scheme, in daylight's play.
Together they build, an historic band,
A tale of South Africa, hand in hand.
